alert.note: Alert for Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Powhatan (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 11 at 4:52PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Virginia, including the following counties and independent city, Chesterfield, City of Richmond, Goochland, Hanover, Henrico and Powhatan. * WHEN...Until 800 PM EDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban or other areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 451 PM EDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Richmond, Tuckahoe, University Of Richmond, Bon Air, Mechanicsville, Manakin, Wyndham, Laurel, Sabot, Lakeside, Glen Allen, Roslyn Hills, Short Pump, Midlothian, Dumbarton, Greendale, Subletts, Longdale, Solomons Store and Holly Hills. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Chesterfield; City of Richmond; Goochland; Hanover; Henrico; Powhatan
